channel.title: CVE Feed for QSAN -- SANOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QSAN -- SANOS

item.title: CVE-2021-32535|2024-09-16T16:38:41.859Z -- qsan -- sanos
item.description: The vulnerability of hard-coded default credentials in QSAN SANOS allows unauthenticated remote attackers to obtain administratorâ€™s permission and execute arbitrary functions. The referred vulnerability has been solved with the updated version of QSAN SANOS v2.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2021-32533|2024-09-16T21:57:43.704Z -- qsan -- sanos
item.description: The QSAN SANOS setting page does not filter special parameters. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands without permissions. The referred vulnerability has been solved with the updated version of QSAN SANOS v2.1.0.
